Class FxPivot

java.lang.Object
net.finmath.smartcontract.product.xml.Schedule
net.finmath.smartcontract.product.xml.FxPivot
public class FxPivot extends Schedule
Pivot is expressed as Schedule, with an initial value and optional steps.
